content:
Dear Hiring Manager,

I am excited to apply for the position of Senior Advisor in Te Puni Kōkiri's Te Tai Tokerau Rohe. I am confident that my extensive experience and skills will allow me to excel in this role.

As a Senior Advisor, I will assist whānau, hapū, iwi, Māori organisations, and Māori communities in developing initiatives to achieve long-term economic and social development. I will lead work with agencies, organisations, and providers to improve outcomes for Māori and act as an effective conduit for information into and out of Māori communities. In addition, I will manage local-level contractual arrangements and provide mentoring and coaching to Advisors in my region.

I possess strong skills in project management and understanding of government and public sector processes, and I am familiar with the relevance of the Treaty of Waitangi to the work being undertaken. I have excellent communication skills, including proficiency in conversational te Reo Māori, and the ability to build and manage relationships with diverse perspectives and experiences. I have a full, clean motor vehicle driver's licence.

I am motivated by Te Puni Kōkiri's values of excellence, valuing people and relationships, working collectively, and being creative and innovative. I believe in a work/life balance and the importance of my Whānau. I am committed to my wellbeing and learning and development.

I am excited about this opportunity and am eager to contribute my skills and experience to this fantastic organization. Thank you for considering my application.

Sincerely,

Liam
